meta.title: Stealth camo's busted. Landing impact.
meta.excerpt: The stealth camo's busted. Landing impact. We must have overused it. Sorry, but you're gonna have to deal with it. You're not in the military anymore.

subtitles.japanese: スネーク: こちらスネーク、 {聞}(き)こえるか、オタコン？
subtitles.english: This is Snake. Do you read me, Otacon?

subtitles.japanese: オタコン: ああ{僕}(ぼく)だよ、スネーク。{聞}(き)こえる……
スネーク: {待}(ま)たせたな、{潜入}(スニーク)ポイントに{到着}(とうちゃく)……
subtitles.english: Kept you waiting, huh? I'm at the "sneak point."

subtitles.japanese: オタコン: {上手}(うま)くいったかい？
スネーク: {着地}(ちゃくち)の{衝撃}(しょうげき)でステルス{迷彩}(めいさい)が{壊}(こわ)れた
subtitles.english: The stealth camo's busted. Landing impact.

subtitles.japanese: オタコン: {随分}(ずいぶん)こき{使}(つか)ってきたからね……{悪}(わる)いけど{我慢}(がまん)してくれ。{軍}(ぐん)じゃないんだ。
subtitles.english: We must have overused it. Sorry, but you're gonna have to deal with it. You're not in the military anymore.

subtitles.japanese: スネーク: ああ。いつまでもこんなものに{頼}(たよ)るつもりはない。
subtitles.english: Right. I didn't plan on relying on this gadget anyway.

subtitles.japanese: オタコン: だけど{民間}(みんかん)の{良}(い)いところもあるだろ？プライバシーは{守}(まも)られてるし……。
subtitles.english: The private sector's not so bad, is it? Privacy guaranteed...

subtitles.japanese: スネーク: {変}(へん)な{薬}(くすり)も{盛}(も)られずにすむしな。
subtitles.english: I'm happy as long as no one gives me any more unwanted gifts.

subtitles.japanese: オタコン: ナオミのこと……？
subtitles.english: You mean that thing with Naomi?

subtitles.japanese: スネーク: うるさい{見張}(みは)り{役}(やく)がいないのも{気}(き)が{楽}(らく)だ。
subtitles.english: And I can't say I miss the chattering nanny.

subtitles.japanese: オタコン: メイリンか……。また{彼女}(かのじょ)に{頼}(たの)んでおくよ。NATICKの{新兵器}(しんへいき)。
subtitles.english: Mei Ling's not so bad. That reminds me, I have to get in touch with her again about that new Natik flashware.

subtitles.japanese: スネーク: {陸軍兵士}(りくぐんへいし)システムセンターからの{横流}(よこなが)しか。{彼女}(かのじょ)に{伝}(つた)えておいてくれ。いずれはバレる。{早}(はや)いうちに{手}(て)を{引}(ひ)くようにな。
subtitles.english: Diverting toys from the SSCEN again? Give her a message from me: someone will find out sooner or later. She's better off assuming it's sooner and quit while she's safe.

subtitles.japanese: オタコン: それもそうだね……。じゃあスネーク、{本題}(ほんだい)に{入}(はい)るよ。シャドーモセス{事件}(じけん)のあとメタルギアの{技術情報}(ぎじゅつじょうほう)がブラックマーケットで{密売}(みつばい)されたよね。
subtitles.english: Too true. Okay, Snake, let's get to work. You know how the technical specs of Meal Gear were sold on the black market after Shadow Moses?

subtitles.japanese: スネーク: オセロットの{仕業}(しわざ)だ。
オタコン: ああ。それで{全世界}(ぜんせかい)にメタルギアの {亜種}(あしゅ)が {拡散}(かくさん)した。
subtitles.english: Exactly. And now every state, group and dotcom has its own version of Metal Gear.

subtitles.japanese: スネーク: いまや{核武装国}(かくぶそうこく)にとって、メタルギアは{特別}(とくべつ)な{兵器}(へいき)ではない。
subtitles.english: Not exactly a classified weapon for today's nuclear powers.

subtitles.japanese: オタコン: {今回}(こんかい)の{新型}(しんがた)はそれらに{対抗}(たいこう)するために{設計}(せっけい)された{物}(もの)らしい。{水陸両用}(すいりくりょうよう)の{対}(たい)メタルギア{兵器}(へいき)……。
subtitles.english: This new one seems to have been designed to wipe the floor with all the other models. The only consistent description is that it's an amphibious, anti-Metal Gear vehicle...

subtitles.japanese: スネーク: それで{新型}(しんがた)は{海兵隊}(かいへたい)の{所属}(しょぞく)って{訳}(わけ)か……？
subtitles.english: That explains why this one is under Marine Corps jurisdiction.

vocabs.english: To guard, to protect, to defend
Diversion into illegal channels; Putting on the black market

vocabs.japanese: {水陸両用}(すいりくりょうよう)
